description:
Subscore for Composite Asthma Severity Index (CASI) daytime asthma symptom assessment. The subscore is based on the highest point value from CASI daytime asthma symptom assessment items (range 0 to 3). [Wildfire JJ, Gergen PJ, Sorkness CA, et al. 2012 (PubMed ID: 22244599)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22244599/)

[Search for all CASI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=casi)
